sentences.en: A crocodilian reptile, such as an alligator , a caiman, or a gavial.
sentences.cn: 鳄类动物鳄类爬行动物, 如短吻鳄 、 凯门鳄或长吻鳄.

sentences.en: All the government shoes are made of alligator hide.
sentences.cn: 公家的鞋都是鳄鱼皮做的.

sentences.en: Alligator lives in the rivers and lakes in the hot wet parts of America and China.
sentences.cn: 短吻鳄产于美洲和中国的江湖及湿热地带.

sentences.en: Alligator skin is five times more costlier than leather.
sentences.cn: 鳄鱼皮比通常的皮革要贵5倍.

sentences.en: Alligator skin is ten times costlier than leather.
sentences.cn: 鳄鱼皮要比皮革贵十倍.

sentences.en: An alligator dressed as an ostrich was chasing me.
sentences.cn: 一只披着鸵鸟皮的鳄鱼正在追赶我.

sentences.en: During the show , an alligator ate a mouse.
sentences.cn: 故事中,鳄鱼把一只老鼠吃掉了.

sentences.en: He was grappling with an alligator in a lagoon.
sentences.cn: 他正在环礁湖里与一只短吻鳄搏斗。

sentences.en: No call alligator long mouth till you pass him.
She wandered off to play with her toy alligator.
Tee Hee: There are two ways to disable an alligator, Mr. Bond.
sentences.cn: 有两个方法可弄走鳄鱼的, 邦先生.

sentences.en: The pythons have even been known to devour the odd alligator.
sentences.cn: 这些大蟒已经因吞噬稀有的短吻鳄而被尽人皆知.

sentences.en: Vibration receptors in jaws let alligator detect tiny movements in water.
sentences.cn: 下颚的感觉接收器让短吻鳄能察觉到水中一丁点的移动.

sentences.en: Woven leathers, and odd textures like alligator will be very popular.
sentences.cn: 织皮以及稀罕材质,如美洲鳄鱼皮,将极受青睐.

sentences.en: You cannot chain your alligator to a fire hydrant.
sentences.cn: 你不可以将鳄鱼拴在消防龙头上.

words.tran_cn: [脊椎]短吻鳄（产于美国及中国）；短吻鳄皮革；鳄口式工具

trans.tran_cn: 鳄鱼般的；鳄鱼皮革的；鳄鱼皮纹的
短吻鳄，短吻鳄皮革，鳄口式工具
trans.tran_en: a large animal with a long mouth and tail and sharp teeth that lives in the hot wet parts of the US and China
